attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BRITANNIA SHOULD NOT BE REMOVED FROM THE COINS SHE HAS GRACED FOR 336 YEARS.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a name.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
